#### some recent highlights:
<br/>

##### I. resilient municipal markets fund (ReMark)
[Global Innovation Lab for Climate Finance (2024)](https://www.climatefinancelab.org/ideas/resilient-municipal-market-fund-remark/)
<br/>
an innovative climate investment mechanism that leverages blended finance to mobilize capital towards resiliency upgrades for urban food markets in Africa.
<br/>
<br/>

##### II. enhancing MDB-NDB cooperation
[Climate Policy Initiative & E3G (2023)](https://www.climatepolicyinitiative.org/publication/enhancing-mdb-ndb-cooperation-understanding-climate-finance-flows-and-paris-alignment/)
<br/>
looks at the state of climate finance cooperation between multilateral and national development banks. data is novel and collected using a combination of web scraping and text matching.
